xwikidoc.title: Car Specifications
xwikidoc.content:
== The Car ==
* 1:8 replice of Audi Q2
== Power Supply ==
* 2 seperate energy circuits * measuring technology and computer ** 6-cell LiPo with 22.2V ** If fully loaded -> operation up to 1 hour ** can be supplied by external power supply with 6-24V * engine and cruise control ** 2-cell LiPo with 7.4V
== Engine ==
* high torque, brushless motor * cruise control which allows controlled forward and reverse driving and braking (even at low speeds) * steering via digital servo motor, also used in model racing ** high actuating power at low operating times
== Lighting ==
* LED lighting * dimmed beam, turn signals, brake and reversing lights can be controlles via ADTF filters
== Computer ==
* miniTX board ** intel core i5 ** 16GB RAM ** 128GB M.2 SSD ** NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti ** 2 Gigabit Ethernet ports ** several USB 3.0 and USB-C ** Bluetooth and WLAN (IEEE 802.11ac) ** additional Arduino micro for battery voltage monitoring
== Sensors ==
* RPLIDAR A2 ** front ** >180° fov ** detection range <6m ** 10Hz update rate * 130° mono video camera ** front * 80° mono video camera ** back * Ultrasonic sensors ** 3 back ** 1 left / 1 right ** <4m detection range ** 40Hz update rate * Wheelspeed sensors * 9-axis motion tracking sensor for: ** accelerations ** angular rates
== Software ==
* ADTF ** developer license for software available on vehicle computer ** new software releases announced in [[forum>>https://www.audi-autonomous-driving-cup.com/forum/||rel=" noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"]]
